verbose_text: Pharmacological inhibition of sphingomyelin synthases with tricyclodecan-9-yl-xanthogenate (D609) results in very rapid (within 3 days) activation of autophagy and reverses the biochemical and behavioral signs of stress induced MDD.
evidence: sphingomyelin synthases with tricyclodecan-9-yl-xanthogenate (D609) results in very rapid (within 3 days) activation of autophagy and reverses the biochemical and behavioral signs of stress-induced MDD
